raw_body: BETSY – BASTIANS (nee NESAMONY) – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. Loving wife of Kingston,​ daughter of late William & Grace Nesamony,​ loving mother of Dinesh & Dilani,​ mother-in-law of Ruvinie & Trevor,​ grandmother of late Adria,​ Dillon,​ Andrea,​ Ryan & Trevin,​ sister of Ranjitham,​ Paul and Peter. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 5.00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 29th November followed by Christian Service and Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella on Thursday,​ 30th November at 4.00 p.m.078247
